text: Imi vanhu veGwaro (maJudha nemaKristu)! Ikozvino mutumwa wedu (Muhammad (SAW)) auya kwamuri achikutsanangurirai zvizhinji kubva kune zvamaiviga kubva muGwaro, uye achisiya zvizhinji (zvisina tsanangudzo). Zvirokwazvo, kwamuri kwakauya mwenje kubva kuna Allah uye neGwaro riri pachena (Qurâ€™aan iri)
